mapper.select:
SELECT
,
,
FROM weighing_bill wb INNER JOIN weighing_statement ws ON wb.id = ws.weighing_bill_id LEFT JOIN weighing_bill_operation_record wbor ON wb.id = wbor.weighing_bill_id WHERE ws.id=#{id}
